Constructor Detail

MissedChallengeNotificationFactory

public MissedChallengeNotificationFactory()
Method Detail

create

public static Notification create(Context context)
Creates a default "Missed challenge" notification. The notification will show your application's icon and standard text. Clicking on it will open the Arena friend list for your application.

Ticker text: Missed challenge!

Title: Jibe Arena

Text: You missed a challenge.

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
a notification which can be displayed using the notification manager

create

public static Notification create(Context context,
                                  Bundle extras)
Creates a personalized "Missed challenge" notification using information from the challenge intent. The notification will show your application's icon and standard text. Clicking on it will open the Arena friend list for your application. You need to set your application ID before calling this method, otherwise it will throw an IllegalStateException.

Ticker text: Missed challenge!

Title: Jibe Arena

Text: You missed a challenge from .

Parameters:
context -
extras - The extras from the original incoming challenge intent.
Returns:
a notification which can be displayed using the notification manager.

createPendingArenaProfileIntent

public static PendingIntent createPendingArenaProfileIntent(Context context,
                                                            Bundle extras)
                                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Creates a pending intent which will open the user's profile in Arena.

Parameters:
context -
extras - The extras from the original incoming challenge intent.
Returns:
A pending intent which can be used in notifications.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the extras bundle does not include EXTRA_JIBE_USER_ID

createPendingArenaFriendListIntent

public static PendingIntent createPendingArenaFriendListIntent(Context context)
                                                        throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
Creates a pending intent which will open the friend list for your game in Arena. You need to set your application ID before calling this method.

Parameters:
context -
Returns:
A pending intent which can be used in notifications.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the application ID has not been set.
